comment.body:
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has been open for 4 days with no activity.
Unfortunately, our resources are limited and we can not always take the time to respond to requests about websites that are not popular enough. The issue will be closed if no further activity occurs.
Please note, that AdGuard Filters is an open-source project that is used by different content blockers and we welcome contributions. If you have some technical knowledge about how websites work, you are welcome to create a pull request following [these instructions](https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md).

performed_via_github_app.name: GitHub Actions

issue.title: walgreens.com

labels.name: Stale
labels.description: The issue is considered as obsolete

issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [x] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [x] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [x] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [x] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [x] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

4.10.9

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Missed analytics or tracker

### Which browser(s) do you use?

other (specify in comment below)

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://www.walgreens.com/pharmacy/fulfillment/rx-landing#!

### Ad Blocking

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, EasyList

### Privacy

AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Tracking Protection filter, EasyPrivacy, Fanboy's Anti-Facebook List, Fanboy's Anti-thirdparty Fonts, Legitimate URL Shortener

### Social Widgets

_No response_

### Annoyances

_No response_

### Security

_No response_

### Other

_No response_

### DNS filters

_No response_

### Language-specific

_No response_

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

trackers:

https://walgreens.digital.nuance.com/tagserver/logging/logline

https://walgreens.digital.nuance.com/tagserver/incrementality/onEvent (tracker? not sure)


to see these you might have to login

### Privacy

- [x] I agree to follow this condition

### Issue URL (Ads) [https://m.happymh.com/mangaread/yIjM3ATM3ATM2ATM4ATMzATMyUTM=gTOycTM2ATM2ATMxATMyUTMzUTM3ATM5ATMwETM5QTMyUTM](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fm.happymh.com%2Fmangaread%2FyIjM3ATM3ATM2ATM4ATMzATMyUTM%3DgTOycTM2ATM2ATMxATMyUTMzUTM3ATM5ATMwETM5QTMyUTM) ### Comment > > > "There used to be no ads, but today when I opened https://m.happymh.com/mangaread/yIjM3ATM3ATM2ATM4ATMzATMyUTM=gTOycTM2ATM2ATMxATMyUTMzUTM3ATM5ATMwETM5QTMyUTM > or other sites in the same series, ads suddenly appeared at the top and bottom. I've enabled all ad blockers, but the ads are still showing." > > Username: `@123eccel` ### Screenshots

pull_request.title: Fix #203266 popularmechanics.com
pull_request.body:
Fix https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/203266

Needs California IP. 

`assets.hearstapps.com/commerce/release/affiliate-` creates `_affClk` cookie and adds tracking parameters to amazon links.

`oply.hearstapps.com` appears after scrolling down to the comment section and wait a bit.
